meanings.definition: A person who is not an architect.
meanings.sent1: The nonarchitect enjoyed designing small houses as a hobby.
meanings.sent2: The office building was designed by a nonarchitect who had a passion for modern art.
meanings.sent3: The nonarchitect accidentally drew up plans for a treehouse instead of a skyscraper.
meanings.sent4: In a world of architects, she stood out as a nonarchitect, bringing a fresh perspective to the field.
meanings.sent5: The nonarchitect's love for creating beautiful spaces was evident in every project.

meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of architecture.
meanings.sent1: The nonarchitect elements of the building added a unique touch to the design.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork had a nonarchitect style that focused on nature and simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The nonarchitect color scheme of the room made it feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: His writing had a nonarchitect quality, drawing inspiration from everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The garden had a nonarchitect charm, with wildflowers growing freely among the rocks.
